name: Sudoku Revival+
description:
Play Sudoku Revival+ on your Apple Watch!

Discover the next evolution of Sudoku.
Unlimited free puzzles in varying levels that allow beginners and experts to enjoy each game. A clean, fresh look with sharp graphics.

GAME CENTER

You can now compete against friends and all online players. See your scores, achievements, and rank. It also features a dedicated score board when playing on your Apple Watch.

THEMES

Three gorgeous themes are available so you can chose what better suits your mood.

SMART NOTES

Not sure which number goes in the box yet? Use the note feature (the pencil) to write in multiple options inside the box.
The "Auto Update Notes" feature, when activated, will automatically remove previous notes once they are no longer viable options.

CONFLICTS DETECTION

The optional conflict detector tells you when you have entered an incorrect number by highlighting the conflicting boxes in red.

NUMBER VISUALIZATION

Clicking on a given number will automatically highlight all the other numbers to make it easy for you to visually see where they are on the board.

RESUME

You can start any game - from any of the available difficulty levels - and decide to stop and resume later. All your information will be saved and ready for you when you return.

MULTIPLE DIFFICULTY LEVELS

Up to 5 levels of difficulty are available (3 on Apple Watch): Extra Easy, Easy, Medium, Difficult and Evil.
Pick the puzzle that matches your skills!

ADD-ONS (optional in-app purchases)

The Magnifier tool allows you to reveal the number inside the box.

Thanks for playing!
